headline: Transaction in Own Shares
summary: Transaction in Own Shares 16 September, 2025 • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • Shell plc (the ‘Company’) announces that on 16 September, 2025 it purchased the following number of Shares for cancellation. headline: Cboe Europe Derivatives to Launch FLEX Options in Europe, Expanding Risk Management Toolkit for European Investors
summary: Cboe Europe Derivatives (CEDX), a leading pan-European equity derivatives marketplace and part of Cboe Global Markets, Inc. (Cboe: CBOE), today announced at Cboe's 2025 Risk Management Conference in Munich, Germany, its plans to launch Cboe FLexible EXchange® options (FLEX options) in Europe, marking a significant step forward in providing tailored risk management tools for institutional investors across the region. The new contracts are scheduled to go live in Q1 2026, subject to external asses
